__e: If anyone belongs on that cursed list, it's Alexander Kirk.
Alexander Kirk is gone, and he won't be back.
Now, that is a fact that I'm prepared to keep secret if, and only if, you give me the SVR file on Alexander Kirk.
We were safe. The whole trip, Alexander and me. Until the ship stopped.
Alexander. About how she did not tell me about him when he was born.
Could you tell him Mr. Alexander and I need to speak with him urgently?
Alexander is scared, confused, hurt... all because his father is refusing to see him.
Alexander go to look and it killed him.
